personal.name: Firas Al Kharusi
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & IT Applications Specialist
personal.bio: I'm an IT Applications Specialist with a passion for building robust, scalable solutions that drive business value. Currently at Vodafone Oman, I lead the end-to-end delivery of enterprise IT solutions, managing multi-vendor environments and ensuring seamless implementation from conception to production. My journey from the University of Michigan to working with major corporations has equipped me with both technical excellence and strong project management skills.
personal.shortBio: Leading end-to-end IT solutions delivery at Vodafone Oman. Transforming ideas into scalable applications with expertise in React, Node.js, Go, Python, and cloud technologies.
highlights: Saved millions by implementing critical TLS 1.2 security fix
Leading IT Programme & Delivery for Oman's newest network operator
Managing 2 Scrum teams across multi-vendor environments
